name: Synthesis (Finn Slutter)
description:
In this space, fast-paste parkour game run through an obstacle course and jump, wall-run and dash your way around to get the fastest time possible.

Medals to beat:

Bronze: 1:00:00
Silver: 50:00
Gold: 35:00
Author time: 28:15

Controls:
WASD: move
Mouse: look
Spacebar: Jump/Dubble jump
LShift: Dash
P/escape: Pause
Enter: respawn at a checkpoint
